revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Dongle300.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = BT Wi-Fi Dongle 300 |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = BT_Wi-Fi_Dongle_N_300 |wikipedia = |brand = BT |model = Wi-Fi Dongle 300 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = 075714 |page_start_date = August 5, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/BT_Wi-Fi_Dongle_N_300 |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 0a5c |device_id = 43a0 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43235;BCM43235KMLG; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [[brcmfmac]] (after runtime device ID insertion) |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = EoL |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 07/2013 |price = 38 |upc = |ean = 5016351515150 |newegg = |asin = B00D84GVF8 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics''' is the presumed manufacturer of this dongle (they make BT's other two newer dongles). The drivers on the '''Windows Update''' ([http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/ScopedViewRedirect.aspx?updateid=b78e6df7-da7c-4152-957a-22643f3d4123 WinXP drivers]) site seem to indicate the probable USB ID for the device is 0a5c:43a0. It is the only ID labeled as '''BT Wi-Fi Dongle''' in the driver set (the rest are labeled as '''BT Dual-Band Wi-Fi Dongle'''). Additional specifications, per '''BT''''s datasheet, follow... *Weight: [[Weight::12.5 g]] *Dimension:: [[Dimensions::80 mm x 28 mm x 9 mm]] *Giftbox barcode: 5016351515150 *Overpack (40x Giftbox) barcode: 05016351822258 ==Links of Interest== :[http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/45436/ Support page] :[http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/45466/c/1243/ Drivers] [http://www.shop.bt.com/products/bt-wi-fi-dongle-300-8W44.html On '''shop.bt.com'''] :[http://www.shop.bt.com/content/uni2/documentation/8w44/wi-fi_dongle_300_data_sheet_v1.1.pdf Datasheet] ==Notes== === Get this baby running with brcmfmac / Linux support === 
1. /lib/firmware/brcm/brcmfmac43236b.bin
2. lsusb | grep Broadcom
   Bus 001 Device 035: ID 0a5c:43a0 Broadcom Corp.
3. modprobe brcmfmac
4. echo 0a5c 43a0 > /sys/bus/usb/drivers/brcmfmac/new_id
5. dmesg
[] usb 1-1.4: new high-speed USB device number 35 using ehci-pci
[] usb 1-1.4: New USB device found, idVendor=0a5c, idProduct=43a0
[] usb 1-1.4: New USB device strings: Mfr=1, Product=2, SerialNumber=3
[] usb 1-1.4: Product: Remote Download Wireless Adapter
[] usb 1-1.4: Manufacturer: Broadcom
[] usb 1-1.4: SerialNumber: 000000000001
[] usbcore: registered new interface driver brcmfmac
[] usb 1-1.4: firmware: direct-loading firmware brcm/brcmfmac43236b.bin
[] brcmfmac: brcmf_c_preinit_dcmds: 
   Firmware version = wl0: Nov 30 2011 17:33:42 version 5.90.188.22
[] usb 1-1.4 wlan13: renamed from wlan1
[[Category:English Documentation]]
